name: Cipfried
marketings: Welcome to the temple of Rookgaard!
Feeling lost, my child? Ask me for hints or help!
Come to me if you need healing!

answers: Hello, |PLAYERNAME|! I'll heal you if you are injured or poisoned. Feel free to ask me for help or general hints.
How can I help you? I can tell you about specific citizens if you tell me their name. I can also give you general hints about Tibia.

custom-data.value: You aren't looking really bad, Asgore on Rook. I can only help in cases of real emergencies. Raise your health simply by eating food.
